itunes:title: Naked and Afraid (Forrest Galante)
title: Naked and Afraid (Forrest Galante)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Our friend Forrest Galante (wildlife biologist, Animal Planet television host, world champion spear fisherman, shark week host) chats about his television show on animal planet (Extinct or Alive), his experience on Naked and Afraid, and what extinct animals he has discovered. Also being charged at by a hippo, bitten by venomous snakes, trying rat, and what jellyfish soup really tastes like.

Check out Forrest on instagram @forrest.galante ; and his podcast THE WILD TIMES

Check us out on instagram @lightweightspod
